name: brrpss

stmt.origin: ax-mp(wb(wbr(c0, crpss, c1), wpss(c0, c1)), wcel(c1, universe))

body.origin:

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wbr(c0, crpss, c1), wpss(c0, c1))
-| wcel(c1, universe)
-| wi(wcel(c1, universe), wb(wbr(c0, crpss, c1), wpss(c0, c1)))

body.origin: |- wi(wcel(c1, universe), wb(wbr(c0, crpss, c1), wpss(c0, c1)))

-| wcel(c1, universe)

comment: The proper subset relation on sets is the same as class proper subsethood. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 2-Nov-2014.)
